House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

official_title: A bill to transfer certain land owned by the United States in Guam, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Governor of Guam to develop a land needs and disposal plan for U.S.-owned lands in Guam. Requires the Governor to submit such plan to the Secretary of the Interior for approval. Directs the Secretary of Defense to transfer such lands to Guam. Sets forth specified conditions and requirements for the transfer of such lands. Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to modify certain conditions on the transfer of such lands to Guam. Amends the Military Construction Authorization Act, 1981 to repeal certain conditions on land transferred to Guam.

titles.title: A bill to transfer certain land owned by the United States in Guam, and for other purposes.
